document_data.name: Dacentrurus
document_data.mainbody: '''Dacentrurus''' ({{Pronounce|day|SEN|troo|rus|refs={{Cite dragon/93/Ay pronunseeAYshun gyd|26}}}}) was a species of [[dinosaur]].
document_data.Description: Dacentrurus looked like its cousin [[stegosaurus]]. Instead of large bony plates running along its back, dacentrurus had long, sharp spikes. It's tail ended in a cluster of spikes.
document_data.Behaviour: Dacentrurus were known for being aggressive.
document_data.Combat: When attacked, dacentrurus always positioned its body so their spikes were facing their opponent. It was capable of delivering significant damage with its spiked tail.
document_data.Biology: Dacentrurus were herbivores and lived in herds.
